summary: Adds an craftable sword with incredible powers, if you have the skills and materials for it.
descriptionHtml:
****This mod requires Dawnguard****
-------Lore overview-------
For generations, for every era that passed, smiths have tried to craft their strongest weapon
they could ever make that their ability allows them. Many incredible blades and weapons
where made durning each era, but there was one blade, that was crafted by an unknown
blacksmith, who knew every art in smithing. He crafted an incredible sword that
could cut armor as if it was just butter.

However, this blade was never found, and it was forgotten. After some years when the
4th era began, the same smith, wrote a book before he died. Acording to the book, it says
that the blade itself will forever exist as long as there are veteran blacksmiths in
tamriel. The key to create this weapon does not covers in blueprints, but in the art
itself. To create this incredible weapon, you need a sword made from each material, wich
are listed below

Iron
Steel
Ebony
Orichalcum
Malachite (glass)
Dwemer Metal
Elven (Moonstone)
Daedric
DragonBone
Silver

With these combines, a master smith can create the incredible blade.
Please do note that the requirement for the blade is a difficult task, and only
veterans will ever hope to use it.
-----Mod Overview----

This mod adds an Ebony type sword that has an incredible damage output.
It has an glowing effect on the blade. For you who thinks the damage is far to
OP and high, thats because you are far to low leveled, since this mod is only for
veteran players who plays Skyrim with their high leveled characters (such
as level 60 and higher). The blade is OP on very low levels, as it was not
designed for low level characters, only veterans.

To craft the weapon, you need a sword from each perk can give you (as stated above).
You can awlays check the requirement field in the smithing menu if you want to know
the ingredients.

In this version, no perk is needed, but you still need all swords from each material
group. Again, this mod is not for low leveled characters, so only use this weapon
on high level (Level 50 is a minimum as my recommendation). 
-----Installation-----

Just place the files into the data folder and run skyrim. The game sould
activate the mod by itself, and no, this mod wont work on pirated versions,
no mather how hard you try.

The mod works best with The ENB Series with nice bloom settings.

-------Updates------

0.5: Initial Release

----------
Credits goes to bethesda for creating skyrim and the base stuff, like
the 3d model. The glow effect and the sound effects and the mod itself
was made by me.
author: cebius
